landing.whoContent: I‘m just a random guy that loves to code. I work mostly as frontend developer, but I love building stuff in Go too. My main knowledge:

minecraftTools.name: Minecraft Tools
minecraftTools.description: Useful tools for the Minecraft game.

softSkillsCheck.name: Soft Skills Check
softSkillsCheck.description: Developed by a volunteer team of students from Faculdade de Tecnologia e Inovação SENAC DF, I was the development leader for this project. This web app aims to provide self-assessments of soft skills.

mcPanelBackend.name: MC Panel Backend
mcPanelBackend.description: A project where some friends could control a Minecraft server hosted in my home. It also had a frontend.

ecommerce.name: Unfinished Go E-commerce
ecommerce.description: In this project I was willing to make a web application for an e-commerce platform using Go only. Eventually, I focused on other things and never finished it, but I learned a lot with it.
